data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Describe a difficult skill you have mastered. Explain how you overcame problems in order to master the skill
data.answer: Time management is the key to success in the workplace as well as in one's personal lives. Without proper time management, people cannot meet their personal daily goals or finish their work on time, resulting in a life filled with stress. In order to master the skill of time management, I have overcome a number of problems. First of all, it is of critical importance to understand why it's important for me to manage my time well: effective time management helps me to get things done on time, to be productive and not waste my own and other people's time. This being said, setting goals is a practical way to implement successful time management. Procrastination is one thing that a large proportion of the population has nowadays. Luckily, there is a broad spectrum of ways to help one overcome procrastination. Living in a digital world means that I can download apps, adjust sleep time, create lists, and whatever else works for me. (162字)
